metadata.title: CVE-2018-18248 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Icinga Web 2 has XSS via the /icingaweb2/monitoring/list/services dirparameter, the /icingaweb2/user/list query string, the/icingaweb2/monitoring/timeline query string, or the /icingaweb2/setupquery string.

criterions.comment: icingaweb2: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
